intro: Psychotria anamallayana, commonly known as the Amazonian psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in dense undergrowth. Psychotria anamallayana plays a role in local ecosystems by providing habitat and food for various insect species.
